stepAnswer: Yes, any system of linear equations can be written as an augmented matrix.
stepTitle: Can any system of linear equations be written as an augmented matrix?
choices: No, only systems of two equations can be written as augmented matrices.
No, only systems of three or more equations can be written as augmented matrices.
Yes, but only if the system has the same number of variables and equations.
Yes, any system of linear equations can be written as an augmented matrix.
